title: Reunited and it Feels So Good
itunes:title: Reunited and it Feels So Good
description:
Tuesday 3/1 - Today on the show news got out that 90's r&b group Xscape will be reuniting so we opened up the phone lines to see what group our listeners would like to see back together. Also, Angela helped some listeners with their life for Ask Yee and Charlamagne gave Donkey of the Day to the Republican Congress.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Tuesday 3/1 - Today on the show news got out that 90's r&b group Xscape will be reuniting so we opened up the phone lines to see what group our listeners would like to see back together.
